forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers. Cloudy. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. North wind around 10 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Scattered Rain Showers then Partly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: Scattered rain showers before 8pm. Partly cloudy. Low around 44, with temperatures rising to around 46 overnight. North northwest wind 5 to 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 61, with temperatures falling to around 59 in the afternoon. North wind 8 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy frost after 5am. Mostly clear, with a low around 37. North northeast wind 2 to 10 mph.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
